summary: Increases the power of the Vampire Lord\'s Summon-able Gargoyle
descriptionHtml:
In an attempt at keeping with the spirit of being modular, I decided to make a simple mod that modifies only the Summon Gargoyle spell for the Vampire Lord. I\'ve noticed several mods that do this, but they modify other things, which would interfere with other vampire mods that I\'m using.

This mod causes the Summon Gargoyle spell to summon a Gargoyle Sentinel boss that starts at level 13 and scales with the player\'s level, up to level 100.

**Done** Update 11/13/2012: Condensing everything into one mod, a level 13 Gargoyle Sentinel that scales with the player and looks like the Gargoyle Brutes (much bigger). I\'ll keep the other two files around in case anyone wants to use the other ones.

(Note: the default gargoyle is naturally weaker than the Sentinel. I haven\'t changed any of the combat stats for the gargoyle so this weakness will remain if people use the non-sentinel variation, but the levels of the Gargoyle will still scale with the player as intended.)

**Done** Update 11/13/2012: Lowering the starting Gargoyle level to 13 from 43, for a new game as a Vampire Lord and for those that aren\'t playing on Master difficulty and/or mods that make gameplay harder.

**Done** Update 11/13/2012: I like the way the default gargoyle minion looks, so I\'ll be adding a file that scales only the default gargoyle minion. I\'ll probably make the Gargoyle Sentinel boss the optional file.
author: Aedred
